recipes.title: Mediterranean Chickpea Salad
recipes.des: A refreshing protein-packed salad tossed in a lemon-olive oil dressing.
steps: Combine chickpeas, chopped vegetables, parsley, and feta in a bowl.
Whisk olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, oregano, salt, and pepper.
Pour dressing over the salad and toss well.
Serve immediately or chill briefly for enhanced flavor

recipes.title: Toast with Avocado and Tomato Slices
recipes.des: A simple and healthy toast topped with creamy avocado and fresh tomato slices.
steps: Toast the bread until golden and crisp.
Mash the avocado with lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Spread the mashed avocado over the toast.
Top with fresh tomato slices.
Drizzle with olive oil if desired and serve immediately.

recipes.title: Salmon with Garlic Lemon Butter Sauce
recipes.des: Tender salmon fillets pan-seared and finished with a rich garlic lemon butter sauce.
recipes.image: https://healthy-recipe-json-server.vercel.app/images/Irresistible Salmon with Garlic Lemon Butter Sauce Recipe - One Day Cooking.jpeg
steps: Season the salmon fillets with salt and pepper.
Heat olive oil in a pan over medium-high heat.
Sear the salmon for 3‚Äì4 minutes per side until golden and cooked through.
Remove salmon and reduce heat to medium.
Add butter to the pan, then stir in garlic and cook until fragrant.
Add lemon juice and zest to create the sauce.
Return salmon to the pan and spoon the garlic lemon butter over the fillets.
Garnish with parsley and serve warm.

recipes.title: Quinoa & Veggie Bowl
recipes.des: A nourishing bowl of fluffy quinoa topped with colorful roasted vegetables and a light dressing.
steps: Cook the quinoa according to package instructions and let it cool slightly.
Roast the vegetables with olive oil, salt, and pepper until tender.
Whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, honey, mustard, salt, and pepper to make the dressing.
Assemble the bowl with quinoa, roasted vegetables, greens, and tomatoes.
Drizzle with the dressing and toss gently before serving.

recipes.title: Sweet Potato Black Bean Quesadillas
recipes.des: Crispy quesadillas filled with roasted sweet potatoes, black beans, and melted cheese.
ingredients: 1 medium sweet potato, peeled and diced
1/2 cup black beans, rinsed and drained
1/2 cup shredded cheese (cheddar or Mexican blend)
dressing: 2 tbsp sour cream or Greek yogurt
steps: Roast the diced sweet potato with olive oil, cumin, paprika, salt, and pepper until tender.
Mash the roasted sweet potato lightly and mix with black beans.
Spread the mixture onto one half of each tortilla and top with shredded cheese.
Fold the tortillas in half and cook in a skillet until golden and crispy on both sides.
Slice and serve with the lime‚Äëyogurt dressing.

recipes.title: Greek Yogurt Parfait
recipes.des: A light and creamy parfait layered with Greek yogurt, fresh fruit, and crunchy granola.
ingredients: 1/2 cup fresh berries (strawberries, blueberries, or raspberries)
steps: Mix the Greek yogurt with honey and vanilla extract if using.
Spoon a layer of yogurt into a glass or bowl.
Add a layer of fresh berries followed by granola.
Repeat the layers until the ingredients are used.
Top with extra berries and a drizzle of honey before serving.

recipes.title: Spinach and Lentil Soup
recipes.des: A hearty and comforting soup made with tender lentils, fresh spinach, and warm spices.
recipes.image: https://healthy-recipe-json-server.vercel.app/images/Spinach and Lentil Soup_ A Healthy, Flavorful Delight! - Dishes Tasty _ Easy & Delicious Recipes.jpeg
steps: Heat olive oil in a pot and saut√© the onion, carrots, and garlic until softened.
Stir in cumin and turmeric and cook briefly until fragrant.
Add the lentils and vegetable broth, then bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer for 20‚Äì25 minutes until lentils are tender.
Stir in fresh spinach and cook until wilted.
Season with salt, pepper, and lemon juice before serving.

recipes.title: Vanilla Cinnamon Buttermilk Pancakes
recipes.des: Fluffy buttermilk pancakes infused with warm cinnamon and sweet vanilla flavor.
steps: Whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, and salt in a bowl.
In a separate bowl, mix buttermilk, egg, melted butter, and vanilla extract.
Combine the wet and dry ingredients, stirring gently until just mixed.
Heat a lightly greased pan over medium heat and pour in the batter.
Cook until bubbles form on the surface, then flip and cook until golden.
Serve warm with maple syrup, melted butter, and a sprinkle of cinnamon.
